name: Candy in the Woods
description:
A game made for the Spooktober GameJam. Theme: "Mask the truth"

Help pumpkin kid find the secret candy stash in the dark woods. But beware! The ghosts lingering in the woods don't like unannounced guests.

The idea was to masking layers. You mask the player layer (the truth) to see other layers (other truths). But you can only see one layer at the time but all the true/correct.

Controls:

WASD \ Arrow keys - Move

Mouse - Click and mask different layers

Credits:

Code, Design, Art: Tayo

Music/Assets used: Cascet by Tozan
